alert.note: Alert for Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:32PM EDT until June 17 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Knox County in south central Maine... Central Lincoln County in south central Maine... Northeastern Sagadahoc County in south central Maine... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 132 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wiscasset, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bath, Damariscotta, Wiscasset, Bristol, Bremen, Woolwich, Bowdoinham, Jefferson, Dresden, Cushing, Edgecomb, Friendship, Alna, Nobleboro, Newcastle, Waldoboro, Richmond, Saint George, Union and Whitefield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
